name: SignalK-Orientation
description: Sends orientation data from accelerometer/gyroscope/magnetometer sensors in Signal K format via WiFi. Uses NXP version 7 sensor fusion algorithm. Hardware required: ESP32 or ESP8266 platform, FXOS8700/FXAS21002 orientation sensor.
keywords: orientation, sensor fusion, compass, magnetometer, e-compass, attitude and heading reference system, Signal K, sensESP
